question: i am alhamdulillah deobandi but all brailvi call us kaafir and they give refernces from deobandi books. so in the following there are some references which brailvi give:
answer:
QUESTION
1) ALLAH jhoot bol sakta hai(fatawa rashidia,p.19, v.1 2) Allah ko pehlay se ilm nahin hota kay banday kya karain gay, jab banday kartay hain to Allah ko ilm hota hai( tafseer balaghatulhairan, p.157 & 158 3) shitan aur mulkulmaut ka ilm Hazoor(saw) say zyada hai( braheen qatia, p.51 4) Allah ke nabi(saw) ko apnay injaam or deevar ke peechay ka bhi ilm nahin ( braheen qatia, p.51 5) Hazoor(saw) ko Allah nay jaisa or jitna ilm ghaib ata farmaya hai, waisa ilm janwaron, paglon or bachon ko bhi haasil hai.(hifzul iman, p.7 6) Hazoor(saw) ke alawa bhi deegar buzurgon ko rahmatul lilaalmin keh saktay hain. (fatawa rashidia, p.12, v.2 7) Nabi(saw) ki taazim sirf baray bhai ki si karni chahiyay. (taqwiyatul iman, p.58 8) Hazoor(saw) mar kar mitti main mil gai.(taqwiyatul iman, p.59 9) Nabi ko taaghoot(shaitan)bolna jaiz hai.(tafseer balaghatul hairan, p.43 10) ummati bazahir amal main nabi say barh jata hai.(tahzeerunnas, p.5 11) deobandi molvion nay Hazoor(saw) ko pulsirat say girnay say bacha liya.(balaghatul hairan, p.8) these books are written by wellknown ulama. so i want to know that did any of deobani aalim have any of the above belief? and please describe each belife in details. and please tell me that anbiya and Muhammad(saw) are alive in their graves? and if all of these believes are wrong then how did brailvis find it in deobandis books.and are brailvis bidda'ti or kaafir? please put light on each belief because im so confused with it.
ANSWER


Share:
1. Instead of us tackling each one individually, allow me to advise you that the Barelwi Ulama are noted for quoting the books of the Deobandi Ulama out of context. We suggest you ignore it altogether.

2. Yes, the Anbiyaa are all alive in their graves.

And Allah Ta?ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
